trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"></xref> exception is thrown when the request to synchronize from all servers fails.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
A message that describes the error.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"></xref> class, using the specified serialization information and streaming context.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"></xref> class with a specified error message and an underlying exception object.
A message that describes the error.
An <xref href="System.Exception"></xref> object that contains underlying exception information.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"></xref> class with a specified error message, an underlying exception object, and a specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersErrorInformation"></xref> object.
A message that describes the error.
An <xref href="System.Exception"></xref> object that contains underlying exception information.
An array of one or more <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersErrorInformation"></xref> objects that describe the errors.
Gets an array of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersErrorInformation"></xref> objects that describe the errors.
An array of one or more <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersErrorInformation"></xref> objects that describe the errors.
Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with information about the exception.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that holds serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> object that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
